review: Previously, when I would present at national meetings, my colleges had only my research to stare at. That's OK but every one at the entomology meetings has slides of cool bugs and I just didn't stand out! Now, with my Delicious PhD Darling Sexy Regalia, I can present with the confidence of knowing that it's not just my research that brings all the entoboys to the yard. I could teach you, but I would have to charge.
